properties.Title: ''Vigilia Pretium Libertatis''
properties.Desc: This is the motto of SHAPE - which is the operational HQ of NATO. Though I am not the biggest fan of over-hyped quotes and mottos, every now and then, I enjoy thinking about some of them... One of which being this one, you can also refer to my other professional experience pin in Istanbul.

properties.Title: ''It doesn't take an army! It takes a few good people.''
properties.Desc: This was my former boss' motto and the exact definition of my team at Solvoyo. Being the COO of a high-tech start-up, Nilufer has always been a great mentor and source of inspiration for me. Not only she has always encouraged me to push my limits and grow in multiple domains, but also has put her trust in me and stood by me just like a true leader. Albeit, it's ironic that I started my journey at NATO given our vision was ''it does not take an army!'' Maybe it's true though, instead of one, it takes thirty of them!
